org.apache.lens.cli.commands

Class LensCubeCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lens.cli.commands.BaseLensCommand
      • org.apache.lens.cli.commands.LensCRUDCommand<T>
        • org.apache.lens.cli.commands.LogicalTableCrudCommand<XCube>
          • org.apache.lens.cli.commands.LensCubeCommands
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.shell.core.CommandMarker, org.springframework.shell.core.ExecutionProcessor

    @Component
@UserDocumentation(title="OLAP Data cube metadata management",
                   description="These commands provide CRUD for cubes")
public class LensCubeCommands
extends LogicalTableCrudCommand<XCube>
